<release version=1.85"> upgraded to Spring 3.2.6.RELEASE, SLF4J 1.7.6
JPAAnnotationsConfigurer shouldn't add Checks twice LocaleProvider, ThreadLocalLocaleProvider, Validator.getLocaleProvider, Validator.setLocaleProvider upgraded to Spring 3.2.5.RELEASE, Paranamer 2.6, xstream 1.4.5, OGNL 3.0.8
added Validator.resolveValue methods upgraded to Spring 3.2.4.RELEASE, Groovy 2.1.6, OGNL 3.0.7, Paranamer 2.5.7, SLF4J 1.7.5, commons-logging 1.1.3
small performance improvement in annotation processing in BeanValidationAnnotationsConfigurer added net.sf.oval.integration.guice.GuiceCheckInitializationListener to support injection of Guice managed objects into constraint check implementations
currentlyCheckingPreConditions in Guard.validateMethodPost made deprecated XML attribute "requireValidElements" of assertValid optional in XSD Wrong generic types used in Check-implementations upgraded to AspectJ 1.7.1, JUnit 4.11, Log4J 1.2.17, SLF4J 1.7.2, XStream 1.4.4, Groovy 2.1.0, BeanShell 2.0b5, OGNL 3.0.6, JRuby 1.6.5, Rhino 1.7R4, Spring 3.2.0.RELEASE, Paranamer 2.5.2, GNU Trove 3.0.3
fixed message variable cache invalidation on MatchPatternCheck NotMatchPatternCheck JSR223 Scripting support
xstream alias typo "postExcecution" in XMLConfigurer.java UnsupportedOperationException when using inspectInterfaces fixed default message attribute value on JSR303 annotations being misinterpreted upgraded to Spring 3.1.1.RELEASE, AspectJ 1.6.12, JUnit 4.10, XStream 1.4.2, OGNL 3.0.4, CGLib 2.2.2, Groovy 1.8.6, commons-jexl 2.1.1, Paranamer 2.4.1
extended BeanValidationAnnotationsConfigurer to support method parameter constraints and return value checks on non-getter methods
